Ukrainian alphabet:
Notes: 1. Combination of letters "зг" is
transliterated as "zgh" (e.g., Згорани – Zghorany,
Розгон Rozghon) as opposed to "zh" – the equivalent of the Ukrainian
letter "ж".

Soft sign and the apostrophe are not reproduced in Latin.


Transliteration of first and last names of individuals and
geographical names is carried out by way of

letter‐for‐letter representation in Latin.
Latin alphabet:
Notes: 1. Combination of letters "зг" is
transliterated as "zgh" (e.g., Згорани – Zghorany,
Розгон Rozghon) as opposed to "zh" – the equivalent of the Ukrainian
letter "ж".

Soft sign and the apostrophe are not reproduced in Latin.


Transliteration of first and last names of individuals and
geographical names is carried out by way of

letter‐for‐letter representation in Latin.
